=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2022/06/03
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Français (Canada)', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', '日本語', 'Português', 'Français (France)'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (Latinoamérica) [CC]', 'Español (España)', 'Español (España) [CC]', 'Français [CC]', 'Italiano [CC]', 'Nederlands [CC]', 'Polski', 'Português', 'Português [SDH]'], 'Directors': ['Brad Peyton'], 'Producers': ['Richard Brener', 'Michael Disco', 'Toby Emmerich', 'Jeff Fierson', 'Dany Garcia', 'Dwayne Johnson', 'Marcus Viscidi', 'Beau Flynn', 'Hiram Garcia', 'Brad Peyton', 'John Rickard'], 'Starring': ['Dwayne Johnson', 'Naomie Harris', 'Malin Akerman'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']}
Review Text: I admit it, I'm easily entertained and I end-up liking the majority of movies that I watch...even the ones others think are lame 😏 I was excited when this movie came out because it's one of my favorite types. Even for me, it was better than I expected. It had an expected amount of cheese sprinkled throughout the movie (which I like 😄💁‍♀️). Overall, I thought it was done well and entertaining to watch!
Review Title: One our family agrees on
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Producers': ['Kris Greengrove', 'Susan Holden', 'Steve Oakes', 'David Starr', 'Richard Winkler', 'Soo Kim', 'Jennifer Twomey', 'Marcy Pritchard', 'Amy Steinberg', 'Max Goodman'], 'Studio': ['CBS']} Such a cute show, my 4 old loves it! I've noticed she developed an interest in math and patterns after starting this show...love that! Fun and catchy songs! Jurassic Park Collection (Jurassic Park / The Lost World: Jurassic Park / Jurassic Park III / Jurassic World) Jeff Goldblum (Actor), Chris Pratt (Actor), Colin Trevorrow (Director, Writer), Joe Johnston (Director) & 1 more Rated: PG-13 Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies ['Steven Spielberg returns to executive produce the long-awaited next installment of his groundbreaking Jurassic Park series, Jurassic World, an epic action-adventure.'] {'Aspect Ratio': '2.20:1, 2:1, 1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.75 x 1 inches; 11.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': '35222591', 'Director': 'Colin Trevorrow, Joe Johnston, Steven Spielberg', 'Media Format': 'Box set, Color, Widescreen, Blu-ray, Digital_copy', 'Run time': '12 hours and 6 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 20, 2015', 'Actors': 'Jeff Goldblum, Chris Pratt, Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Bryce Dallas Howard', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Producers': 'Frank Marshall, Steven Spielberg, Patrick Crowley, Larry Franco, Kathleen Kennedy', 'Language': 'English (DTS-HD Master Audio 5.1), French (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS-HD 2.0), French (DTS 5.1), French Canadian (DTS 5.1), Spanish (DTS 5.1)', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Rick Jaffa, Amanda Silver, Peter Buchman, Derek Connolly, Colin Trevorrow', 'Number of discs': '6'} We have had this set for a while now and it's great! I'm sorry, I'm not a person that knows all the tech details but from my perspective it's
the picture quality, value and the nerd factor of having the collection🤓🐊 from my perspective it's the picture quality, value and the nerd factor {'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '한국어', '日本語', 'العربية', 'Português', 'Nederlands', 'Deutsch', 'Русский', 'हिन्दी', 'Español (España)', 'Indonesia', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Türkçe', '中文（台灣）', '中文（中国）', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Deutsch', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Français', 'हिन्दी', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português', 'Русский', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Cam Lizotte', 'Nico Rijgersberg', 'Jay Silver', 'Joshua Young', 'Gilly Fogg'], 'Producers': ['Kristen Newlands', 'Phillip Stamp', 'Dr. Alice Wilder', 'Steven Denure', 'Shevaun Gray', 'Anne Loi', 'Margaret Harrison', 'Wendy Harris', 'Samantha Freeman'], 'Starring': ['DevanCohen', 'Ava Close', 'Elizabeth Hanna'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} I do think it's a cute show and I like that it's clean and sweet. My 7 year old loves it!

But the singing reeeeeaallly gets to me. I wondered if I was the only one but I see from other season/episode reviews that I'm not🤔

Other than that, it's worthy of 5 stars, in my opinion🙄 Sorry but the singing makes me want to rate it much lower {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Walt Dohrn'], 'Producers': ['Gina Shay'], 'Starring': ['Sam Rockwell', 'Caroline Hjelt', 'Anthony Ramos'], 'Studio': ['Universal Pictures']} I think most Trolls fans will love it (definitely the kiddos). I like the message it gives about people in our world (well their world) being different but we still need each other. I don't have much that I don't like about it. Overall love it and the music but the 2 things I feel are slight, personal disappointments:

-Renting price: Mixed feelings. Had we seen it in theater we would have easily spent 3 times the amount for one showing (at a dine-in theater) so that's definitely cheaper...but, I guess I had in my mind it was going to be like Onward and have the ability to rent or buy. I'm thankful for the ability to see it since we had been excited for it for while...and a bit of fun to a difficult time. But we likely won't be able to rent it again after this time. So mixed feelings- thankful for the ability of watching it…but also kind of bummed that it still feels a bit expensive, during this time, to rent it. No one made me rent it though still sharing my personal viewpoint 🤔

-Second: I'm not really strict about kids movies but I am getting tired of kids movies having butt jokes/showing butts… of course it cracks my kiddo up lol ugh BUT why is it necessary😒 There's not too much in this one- I think there were just a couple, still though...there are many other ways to make them laugh!

ANYWAY, off my soapbox now. I did actually love the movie. We're currently watching it for the third time. My 9 year old is for sure enjoying it! We're loving it! Though a little mixed feelings about renting {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jake Kasdan'], 'Producers': ['Matt Tolmach', 'William Teitler'], 'Starring': ['Dwayne Johnson', 'Kevin Hart', 'Jack Black'], 'Studio': ['SONY PICTURES ENTERTAINMENT', 'INC.']} I refused to watch this for years (Idk why, I like all the actors a lot) but then my daughter got me to finally watch it and I ended up really liking it. I was laughing a lot throughout it. Surprisingly interesting! Didn't want to see it Ghostbusters Science Fiction, Comedy, Eerie, Joyous ['Ghosts invade New York and force a trio of spirit exterminators to save the city in one of the biggest comedies of all time. Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd and Sigourney Weaver head the all-star cast.'] {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'frightening scenes', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ivan Reitman'], 'Producers': ['Ivan Reitman'], 'Starring': ['Bill Murray', 'Casey Kasem', 'Dan Aykroyd']} No issues with streaming which made it extra-enjoyable to watch 😄 Never gets old! {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ivan Reitman'], 'Producers': ['Ivan Reitman'], 'Starring': ['Bill Murray', 'Dan Aykroyd', 'Sigourney Weaver'], 'Studio': ['Columbia Pictures']} Love the movie and the streaming quality was great A favorite {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Hartbreak Films', 'Inc.'], 'Producers': ['Paula Hart', 'Andrew Gernhard', 'Leslie Gilliams', 'Melissa Joan Hart', 'Erica Joseph Hunter', 'Mario Lopez', 'Paul Melluzzo', 'Anthony Del Negro', "Shane O'Brien", "Zach O'Brien"], 'Studio': ['Lifetime']} We really like this one- they are cute together in this (we also like them in Holiday In Handcuffs, too) and the story line is likeable and nothing stood out to me as being a negative. Likeable enough to watch it more than once each season 😊 Cute! {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Hartbreak Films', 'Inc.'], 'Producers': ['John Doolan', 'Andrew Gernhard', 'Leslie Gilliams', 'Melissa Joan Hart', 'Paula Hart', 'Erica Joseph Hunter', 'Greg White']} I don't think there's a Christmas movie of hers that I wouldn't like. It's got cheese and obviously couldn't really happen but those are things I like about these types of Christmas movies. I like this one! I like it {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['LHP Distri Inc C/O Bridge Stud'], 'Producers': ['Paul A. Kaufman', 'Sammie Astaneh', 'Jamie Goehring', 'Kevin Leslie', 'Michael Shepard', 'Costa Vassos', 'Shawn Williamson'], 'Studio': ['Lifetime']} That type of Christmas movie that I like- simple, sweet and clean. I enjoy this one 😊 Like it Ghostbusters: Afterlife Science Fiction, Comedy, Fantasy, Adventure ['When a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.'] {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'frightening scenes', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jason Reitman'], 'Producers': ['Ivan Reitman'], 'Starring': ['Paul Rudd', 'Carrie Coon', 'Finn Wolfhard']} We looked forward to seeing this and knew we would like it but we all agree it was better than we expected it to be. profile:
The user actively engages with educational and entertaining content for young children, particularly programs that blend music with math learning, reflecting their child's interest in math. They prioritize family-friendly entertainment while maintaining a critical perspective on content quality. Their reviews consistently express enthusiasm for narratives that convey themes of diversity and connection, emphasizing a preference for relatable storytelling.

Their recent interactions have demonstrated an openness to exploring diverse genres, including adult films that feature exceptional picture quality and intellectual depth. This shift indicates a desire for content that fosters family discussions and showcases a discerning approach across all media. The user shows a fondness for charming narratives, especially simple and clean holiday films that resonate across generations. 

The latest engagement with a light-hearted science fiction-comedy reveals their willingness to embrace movies with more mature themes while appreciating fun, engaging storytelling. The user found this film unexpectedly enjoyable, highlighting their knack for finding quality entertainment that captivates the entire family. They seek a rich mix of content that balances entertainment with meaningful themes, ensuring accessibility for all ages while meeting their elevated standards. Additionally, their enthusiasm for films with a sprinkle of cheese suggests a light-hearted approach to entertainment, where they appreciate both charm and engagement in storytelling.
